title: E-commerce Web App
description: A fully functional e-commerce platform with Stripe payments, user authentication, and an admin dashboard.

title: Personal Portfolio
description: A sleek and modern portfolio site built with React and TypeScript, featuring a blog and project showcase.

title: Task Manager App
description: A task management app with drag-and-drop functionality, notifications, and collaborative features.

title: AI Chatbot
description: An AI-powered chatbot that integrates with OpenAI's GPT API to provide conversational AI support.

title: Weather App
description: A simple weather app that fetches real-time weather data and provides forecasts for any location.

title: Blog CMS
description: A headless CMS for blogging, allowing authors to manage posts via a custom dashboard.
